Config.Script:
/* The following predefined read only variables can be used in the script:
Process variables - using 'processVariables.[name of the process variable]': The variables defined in the preferences can be similarly used. - RootDir - _LicensePath - _LogLevel - _LogDir - ProcessDir - _NodeId - _NodeName - ProcessId - ProcessName - ProcessStartTime - ProcessingMode - _JobId - ProfileDir - _InputDir - _InputName - _OutputDir - _OutputName - _StartPage - _EndPage - _UnregisteredBreakMessages - _RegisteredBreakMessages
File variables - using 'fileVariables.[name of the file variable]': - InputFileDirectory - InputFilePath - InputFileName - InputFileBaseName - InputFileExtension - InputFileType - InputFileAuthor - OutputFileDefaultExtension - OutputFileType
Page variables - using 'pageVariables.[name of the page variable]': - PageNumber - PageNumberProcess - PageIsLast
All variables listed above (read only) - using 'allVariables.[name of the variable]'.
Special variables - DocPonents and util classes: The variables defined in the list below can be similarly used. - logger - frame - inputDocument - page - bookmarks - frameResourceCache */
